state.info-label: State of matter at room temperature

info-values.unreactive gas: Hadashite, Puzzlite, Shemeshite, and Voyagite are very unreactive. No compounds of these elements are known to exist on Olam.
info-values.triatomic gas: Aquagen is a triatomic gas, as is Acidium.
info-values.(see #3): Newairon, Flowing, and Greening all exist as either diatomic gases or crystalline solids. They readily enter into ionic compounds of the form NwX<sub>2</sub> , where X = Fl, or Gr.
info-values.unreactive metal: Badgerin, Brooklin, Tennessean, and Zinzan are rather unreactive metals that are used in Olamite coinage.
info-values.high IE: Margaran, Chameshan, Halfwanon and Gazozite have higher than expected ionization energies.
